targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (location) (count_over_time({job="nginx_geoip"} | json | geoip_country != "" | label_format location="{{.geoip_city}} - {{.geoip_country}}" [$__range])))

topk(10, sum by (ip) (
  count_over_time(
    {job="modsecurity"}
    |~ "ModSecurity: Access denied"
    | regexp `client\s(?P<ip>[0-9a-fA-F:.]+)`
    | ip != ""
  [$__range])
))
